name: Hit the Jackpot! (IT5007)
description: Real-time map view of HDB listings with historical transaction trends.
details: Grade: A. Real-time map view of HDB listings with historical transaction trends.

name: LightningCAT (CS5224)
description: Map-first ActiveSG-style web app concept with lightweight recommendations.
details: Grade: A-. Map-first ActiveSG-style web app concept with lightweight recommendations.

name: Endomondo Dataset Exploration (IT5100F)
description: EDA, PCA, and exercise prediction with Random Forest using only the first 60 seconds of activity data.
details: Grade: A+. EDA, PCA, and exercise prediction with Random Forest using only the first 60 seconds of activity data.

name: News Bias Classification (CS5242)
description: Ideological bias classification: transformer vs. classical baselines; evaluation-focused experimentation.
details: Grade: A-. Ideological bias classification: transformer vs. classical baselines; evaluation-focused experimentation. Slides: /NN-Presentation.pdf.

name: BERT, Llama and friends tackle SQuADv1.0 (CS4248)
description: Augmenting models to improve EM/F1 with focused experimentation and analysis.
details: Grade: A-. Augmenting models to improve EM/F1 with focused experimentation and analysis. Report: /NLP-Report.pdf.

name: Capstone Research Project (CP5105)
description: Adapting LLMs for emotional-support interactions in low-resource / colloquial dialect settings and their effects on user perceptions and affect.
details: Grade: A+. Adapting LLMs for emotional-support interactions in low-resource / colloquial dialect settings and their effects on user perceptions and affect.

name: MCAT-How? (Ongoing)
description: RAG assistant that personalizes MCAT study plans to user constraints and baseline knowledge.
details: Status: ongoing. RAG assistant that personalizes MCAT study plans to user constraints and baseline knowledge.
